channel.title: Recolouring Help: I Just Need Colour Id's
channel.description:
I Need The Colour Id's
Eg, Black Might Equal 1111 Eg, White Might Equal 2222??
Please Help, Just Need The BASIC COLOURS.
Like Red Light Red Blue Light Blue Green Light Green Yellow Gold Orange Pink Purple

item.title: Recolouring Help: I Just Need Colour Id's
item.dc:creator: @Spider-killa Spider-killa
item.description:
@Spider-killa wrote:

Red=1243
Light Red=1242
Blue=1244
Light Blue1245
Green1246
Light Green1247
Yellow
Gold
Orange
Pink
Purple

Read full topic
item.source: Recolouring Help: I Just Need Colour Id's
